text: The Miss Oklahoma World competition is a beauty pageant that selects the representative for Oklahoma in the Miss World America pageant.The American representatives to Miss World 1978-1994 The current Miss Oklahoma World is Priscilla Wang of Oklahoma City. == Winners == ;Color key {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#FFFFFF" ! width=5% | Year ! width=20%| Name ! width=10%| Hometown !
